Problem.title: Default: nums
Problem.author: A. Klenin
Problem.ProblemStatement: You are to write a problem that reads two positive integers $A$ and $B$ with no more then five decimal digits and outputs their sum $A + B$.
Problem.InputFormat: First line of input file contains two integers $A$ and $B$.
Problem.OutputFormat: Output file must contain a single integer $C = A + B$.
